channel.title: Fun on Yaya's World
channel.description: Recent content in Fun on Yaya's World

item.title: Wallpapers
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: This is a collection of some of my favorite wallpapers. I like vector art and I like wallpapers that aren’t too busy. If you like those things too, then maybe you should download some of these…or not…up to you ðŸ˜œ. I do not own any of these wallpapers. If I have information on who created it, that information is in the caption! Also for basically all of autumn last year I rocked a very dark theme on all of my devices.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Yaya's Creations
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I draw too! That’s right I don’t just play games, but I also like to draw. I don’t get much time to draw, but I’m hoping to make some more time soon. I have ideas I want to do! Anyway, below are just a couple of things that I have drawn!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Wall o' ADVENTURE
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: This is my Wall o’ ADVENTURE! Currently its a bunch of random screenshots from Fiesta Online. In the future I plan on putting other screenshots from other games that don’t fit with a particular theme or story here. I think I’ll have more specific galleries for screenshots and peektures that have some kind of theme, but these are all I have at the moment.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Chapter 1: Where's My Baby!?
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: While on an ADVENTURE with Yayoi, Baby ended up chasing a sheep. After, finally, catching up to the sheep, Baby gave it a nice pet. It was so fluffy and soft, she couldn't resist. She looked around and found that she was no longer with Yayoi. In fact, Yayoi was no where to be seen. Fortunately a party of friends was out on an ADVENTURE of their own and found her, now in Burning Hill, by herself.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi
